price: Yoo ishee isin gaafatee (gaafii) isinitti bay’ise isin ni dhorgattu turtan; Innis (Rabbiinis) gadoo keessan ni baasa.
arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: in yasalkumūhā fayuḥ'fikum tabkhalū wayukh'rij aḍghānakum
translations: He were to ask you for it
